title: How to Level up quicker?
body:
Heh, well my friends are going into ranked soon and I wanted to catch up :3  Any suggestions?



Thanks Summoner!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Here's a few things that could help:

+ You wouldn't happen to have that **400 RP** that you get a level 3 still?

 If you do or are willing to pay, buy the **3 day XP boost** from the _"Boosts"_ section in the store. 

 Once you get it, just spam as many games as possible to get the most use out of it. I'd recommend buying it on a weekend, when you know you'll have lots of time to use it.

+ Play Twisted Treeline when it's available on Thursday to Saturday after 3:00pm. I've heard it grants the most XP and IP relative to game time.

+ Play bots! You'll be able to play far more bot games in 1 hour than normal games. There's only a 10% decrease in XP for levels 20 - 29.

 It's a great alternative to normals, when you want something casual or don't have as much time.

Other than that, just keep playing your favorite game-modes heaps!
just curious... don't u need to own like 16 heroes to join the ranked game?
play intermediate coop vs AI with xp boost. Use snowball champs

3 day XP boost and grind AI games.

Good luck in Bronze if you are rushing rather than learning though.
Well, I'll take advice and slow down.... xD
